item.title: Prolog: Living in a Dictatorship
item.description: You might have heard stories about the current situation in Iran, people are protesting, or better saying, it’s not a protest anymore, it’s a revolution. The government brutally kills innocent people, even children. They are using live ammunition, Nevertheless, they have failed to suppress the people yet and people are still in the streets. This is a fact that Iranian people don’t want the Islamic republic anymore, there is ample evidence supporting this fact, more than someone could have doubts about it.
